messages.content: ComfyUI-Pronodes is a collection of utility nodes for ComfyUI, with features still in development.
You can install ComfyUI-Pronodes via the ComfyUI-Manager.
What does the Load Youtube Video Node do?
The Load Youtube Video Node downloads a video from a youtube URL, saves it to the /output directory, and skips the download if the video already exists locally.
Does the Load Youtube Video Node display any additional details?
Yes, the node displays the video's fps, title, and resolution preview underneath the node.
What does the Preview VHS Audio Node do?
The Preview VHS Audio Node displays the audio from ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite.
What does the VHS Filenames to Path Node do?
The VHS Filenames to Path Node converts filenames from ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite to file paths.
Can you provide the Changelog for ComfyUI-Pronodes?

The most recent updates include added Preview VHS audio node + VHS Filenames to Path node on 08/03/2024, refactoring js with chaincallback (from VHS) + display video on reload on 03/02/2024, added video + fps + title + resolution preview under LYV node on 17/02/2024, simplified LYV node & removed VHS codes on 15/02/2024, and setup repository + published to manager + added Load Youtube Video Node (LYV) on 14/02/2024.
